Clash of Arms Games (COA 970265) Naval tactical warfare in the Age of Sail, 1740-1815 Close Action is all about teamwork and out-maneuvering one_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s enemy by coordinating the movements of a fleet of wooden ships. You plot movement for your ships, send signals to your friendly captains, and assign crew to various tasks such as changing sails or firing the great guns. Played on a hex grid, the ships move fairly accurately and historic battles can be recreated with lots of realism. This games scales extremely well, playing as well if not better with 20 players as with 3, 4 or 5. This is volume #1 of the Close Action series by Mark Campbell. The two additional volumes come in the form of scenario books and depict battles from different major conflicts. The core rules provided in the original game box are needed to play these scenarios. Expanded by (in order of release): Rebel Seas Monsoon Seas
Some slight box warping due to storage. Otherwise everything present, correct and in excellent condition Shipping UK £5.00 / Europe £10.00

Clash of Arms Games (COA 970265) In the end, Napoleon lost his war with England. Triumphant against all the thrones of Europe, never could he penetrate the walls of oak that surrounded Albion to land an army and deliver the knockout blow. Discover the secrets of Britain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s superior ship handling in the age of sail with Close Action. Some 25 scenarios, ranging from ship vs. ship (training exercises) to fleet actions (the Nile Campaign) cover a variety of British, French, Russian, Turkish, and Spanish ships throughout the period. In addition to the Napoleonic Wars, there are selected actions from the American War of Independence and the War of 1812. Developed for over 10 years by Mark Campbell, Close Action features 70 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x ½_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ship counters, 140 markers and accommodates from two to sixteen players on its two 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; maps. If your interest runs to miniatures, the rules and charts need no changes to adapt to the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;big mat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Can you do better than Nelson? Or, will you do what no one ever did and defeat him in a fleet action? Sail alongside, for it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sure to be a Close Action.

All games are new and in their original wrapping and all prices include the German VAT (7% or 19%). We offer only goods that we have in stock. We ship worldwide – please ask for a quote about exact shipping costs (rest assured that we always try to keep them as low as possible). Payment may be made by Paypal or bank transfer in advance. For orders above €50 we grant a discount of €5 on shipping costs. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). Our Terms and Conditions 1. General All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies. 2. Orders and prices We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product. All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices. 5. Cancellations, Refunds _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification. Please ensure that any products returned are in good condition. If you check the products in a manner that you will have done, for example, in a shop, this is fine. Any other handling of the product(s) might entitle Gamers HQ to some compensation from you, which might in rare cases amount to the original sum paid for the product(s). So should you feel that you might cancel your order by returning the products, please limit your inspection of the products to optical checks and do not use them on a regular basis. If you return your order within two weeks in the above manner, we shall refund you the costs for sending the product(s) back to us (unless your cancelled order amounts less than 20 euros, in which case you as the customer will bear the cost of return postage). Please ensure that you use appropriate packing material when sending back the product(s) — preferably using the original wrapping. Please note that German law, following the EU directive 97/7/EG of 20 May 1997, specifies that the right to return items and receive a full refund is not applicable to the purchase of newspapers, magazines or journals (§312d BGB) as well as the purchase of audio- or video-recordings and software once you have broken the seal of the package. Should we accidently send you the wrong products, please return them to us and we shall refund you the return postage immediately. Any cancellation of an order has to be done in writing (by post, fax or email). 6. Ownership Please note that ordered products remain our property until you have fully paid for them. 7. Personal data We are committed to protecting your personal information and will keep the information you entrust to us safely and securely. We may collect information from you to monitor website visitor patterns, so that we can improve our website. We also collect information from you to handle orders, deliver products and services, process payments, communicate with you about orders, products and services, update our records and generally maintain your customer profile with us. However, we shall never sell or share your personal information with third parties. Our customer data — in so far as required to provide the above services and within the limits defined by the data protection laws of Germany (paragraph 26 BDSG) — is saved and handled on a separate, network-independent computer. 8. Other matters We reserve the right to reject orders without any explanation. Also please note that you as a customer cannot assert a claim against Gamers HQ if, for whatever reason, we are unable to source the item(s) you have ordered. Such cases arise only very exceptionally; we try to ensure that everything we advertise in our web shop is in stock. Where, for whatever reason, we are unable to deliver we promptly refund in full everything you have paid. 9. Limitation of liability: external links Although we check the content of external links provided on our website, we have no control over or responsibility for these domains to which we provide the links or which link to us. That responsibility solely rests with those who manage the respective domains. 10. Place of jurisdiction Any disputes arising hereunder will be settled before a Berlin court. We reserve the right to choose the customer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s place of jurisdiction instead. 11. Severability clause If parts of these terms and conditions become ineffective, the remainder of these terms still apply. Innerhalb Deutschlands gilt: Alle Spiele sind Neuware und in Orginalverpackung . Alle Preise sind inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer von 7% bzw. 19%. Die Versandkosten betragen 5,00 € innerhalb Deutschlands. Ab einem Bestellwert von 50,00 € fallen keine Versandkosten innerhalb Deutschlands an! Bezahlt werden kann per paypal, Vorauskasse, Bankeinzug oder direkt bei uns im Laden (wenn ihr aus Berlin kommt). Wenn ihr noch irgendwelche Fragen habt, ruft uns an (030 79706126), schickt uns ne Mail (laden@gamers-hq.de) oder besucht unsere Homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). AGB: 1. Allgemeines Alle Transaktionen zwischen dem Gamers HQ und seinen Kunden unterliegen ausschließlich den nachfolgenden Allgemeinen Geschäftsbedingungen und basieren auf der Grundlage des Rechts der Bundesrepublik Deutschland. Diese AGB gelten mit der Annahme der Sendung des Gamers-HQ als anerkannt. 2. Auftragsannahme und Preise Alle Angebote und Preise sind freibleibend; Liefermöglichkeit vorbehalten. Preisänderungen, auch ohne Ankündigung, oder Irrtümer sind jederzeit vorbehalten. Alle Preisangaben sind in Euro und inklusive der gesetzlichen Mehrwertsteuer. 3. Lieferung Alle Lieferungen erfolgen ab dem Gamers-HQ. Alle Lieferungen erfolgen auf Rechnung des Käufers. In der Regel liefern wir mit DHL, in besonderen Fällen kann davon abgewichen werden. Die Entscheidung hierüber liegt beim Gamer´s HQ. Alle Bestellung werden normalerweise innerhalb von 2 Werktagen verschickt. Teillieferungen gelten als jeweils separates Geschäft. Der Versand erfolgt ab einem Rechnungsbetrag von Euro 50,- € innerhalb Deutschlands versandkostenfrei. Bei Bestellungen unter diesem Betrag erheben wir innerhalb Deutschlands eine Versandkostengebühr von Euro 5,-€. 4. Zahlungsbedingungen Wir bieten standartmäßig 3 Möglichkeiten der Bezahlung an: Per Bankeinzug, Vorkasse oder per PayPal .Nach der dritten Bestellung räumen wir unseren Kunden auch die Möglichkeit des Kaufs auf Rechnung ein, wir sind jedoch befugt, diese Möglichkeit bei mehrmaligem Zahlungsverzug auch wieder zu widerrufen. 5. Rückgaberecht Sie können ohne Angabe von Gründen durch Erklärung per Fax, E-Mail oder einfaches Briefschreiben oder durch Rücksendung unserer Waren eine Bestellung widerrufen. Für die Absendung der Widerrufserklärung oder unserer Waren ist eine Widerrufsfrist von zwei Wochen einzuhalten, die mit Eingang unserer Lieferung bei Ihnen beginnt. Ein Widerrufsrecht steht Ihnen - auch innerhalb der Widerrufsfrist - in keinem Fall bei folgenden Waren zu: - Audio- oder Videoaufzeichnungen bzw. Software, wenn Sie die entsprechenden Datenträger entsiegelt haben, - Zeitungen, Zeitschriften und Illustrierten. Unsere Ware ist sofort nach der fristgerechten Ausübung des Widerrufsrechts auf unsere Kosten und Gefahr an uns zurückzusenden, wenn der Widerruf nicht bereits durch Rücksendung ausgeübt wurde. Achten Sie bitte bei der Rücksendung darauf, dass Sie eine geeignete Verpackung benutzen, vorzugsweise die Originalverpackung. Ausnahmsweise sind die Kosten der Rücksendung von Ihnen zu tragen, wenn der Rechnungswert unserer Ware nicht mehr als Euro 20,00 beträgt. In keinem Fall haben Sie die Kosten der Rücksendung zu tragen, wenn die von uns gelieferte Ware nicht der bestellten Ware entspricht. Sollten Sie bereits den Kaufpreis für die Ware bezahlt haben, werden wir diesen nach einem Widerruf unverzüglich zurückerstatten. Wenn Sie unsere Ware nach dem Widerruf ganz oder teilweise nicht oder nur in verschlechtertem Zustand zurücksenden, sind Sie uns gesetzlich zu Wertersatz verpflichtet. Das gilt nicht, soweit Sie unsere Ware lediglich so geprüft haben, wie Sie es z.B. im Ladengeschäft hätten tun können. Jede darüber hinausgehende Nutzung der Ware berechtigt uns jedoch zu Ersatzansprüchen, die unter Umständen die Höhe des Kaufpreises erreichen können. Sollten Sie also einen Widerruf in Betracht ziehen, beschränken Sie sich möglichst auf eine optische Prüfung und nehmen Sie die Ware nicht regulär in Gebrauch. 6. Kundendaten werden unter keinen Umständen Dritten zur Verfügung gestellt. 8. Sonstiges Die Ablehnung von Aufträgen, auch ohne Angaben von Gründen, behalten wir uns ausdrücklich vor. Aus Lieferschwierigkeiten unsererseits erwachsen keinerlei Ansprüche gegen das Gamers-HQ. Können Bestellungen aus irgendwelchen Gründen nicht ausgeführt werden, werden bereits geleistete Zahlungen umgehend zurückerstattet. 9. Haftungshinweis Trotz sorgfältiger inhaltlicher Kontrolle übernehmen wir keine Haftung für die Inhalte externer Links. Salvatorische Klausel Die Unwirksamkeit einzelner Bestimmungen berührt die Gültigkeit der Geschäftsbedingungen im übrigen nicht.

Clash of Arms Games (COA 970265) In the end, Napoleon lost his war with England. Triumphant against all the thrones of Europe, never could he penetrate the walls of oak that surrounded Albion to land an army and deliver the knockout blow. Discover the secrets of Britain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s superior ship handling in the age of sail with Close Action. Some 25 scenarios, ranging from ship vs. ship (training exercises) to fleet actions (the Nile Campaign) cover a variety of British, French, Russian, Turkish, and Spanish ships throughout the period. In addition to the Napoleonic Wars, there are selected actions from the American War of Independence and the War of 1812. Developed for over 10 years by Mark Campbell, Close Action features 70 1_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x ½_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ship counters, 140 markers and accommodates from two to sixteen players on its two 34_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;x22_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; maps. If your interest runs to miniatures, the rules and charts need no changes to adapt to the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;big mat._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; Can you do better than Nelson? Or, will you do what no one ever did and defeat him in a fleet action? Sail alongside, for it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s sure to be a Close Action.

Payment may be made by Paypal (no extra fee) or bank transfer in advance. If you have any questions, feel free to send us an email (laden@gamers-hq.de), give us a call (+49 30 79706126) or visit our homepage (www.gamers-hq.de). If You´re a German buyer, just read the text below (“…innerhalb Deutschlands gilt:..”) Our Terms and Conditions 1. General All transactions between Gamers HQ and you, the customer, are subject to the following conditions, which you acknowledge by accepting delivery of your ordered products. These conditions do not affect your statutory rights and in all cases German law applies. 2. Orders and prices We do our level best to ensure that the information on our website is up-to-date. Please note that offers and prices are subject to change. We work to ensure that our prices are all correct, but cannot be held responsible for accidentally displaying the wrong price of a product. All prices are quoted in Euros and already include all necessary taxes. 3. Lead times and delivery costs Our products are delivered directly from our Berlin base, and orders are usually dispatched within two working days. Dispatch and transport are at the expense of the customer. We usually ship orders with DHL but explicitly reserve the right to choose another method of transport. If an order is split into several deliveries, each delivery counts as a separate transaction. Delivery within Germany is free of charge if your order amounts to a total of 50 euros or more. Below that amount, we charge a one-off fee of 5 euros. Our products can also be ordered for delivery outside Germany. In that case, an estimate of the delivery costs is added to your order during checkout. Please note that this delivery cost estimate does not necessarily constitute the final amount. We shall contact you personally by email after you have placed your order to present you with delivery options and to quote the final price for delivery costs. 4. Payment options We currently offer the following three payment options: direct debit from your bank account (only within Germany), bank transfer (prepayment) and PayPal. Once you have placed three orders, we also offer you the option to pay by invoice. Such privileges can, however, be withdrawn should we encounter repeated delays in settling invoices. 5. Cancellations, Refunds _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Returns Should you wish to cancel your order, you can do so by notifying us by fax, email, letter or by simply returning your product(s) to Gamers HQ. No questions asked. Please note that such a cancellation has to be done within two weeks after having received your ordered product(s). Should you have already paid for your order, we shall refund those costs to you as soon as we have received your cancellation notification.
